channel.title: Pet Peeves
channel.description:
Subject pretty much explains but...What are your pet peeves? (Something you really hate and pisses you off)
Mine is when you're wrighting with pen and some goes by and accidently hits your elbow causing your pen to go all over your paper.

item.title: Pet Peeves
item.dc:creator: @j4m3s j4m3s
item.description:
@j4m3s wrote:

waits for greeny to come and pwn all our swimming times

Read full topic

item.title: Pet Peeves
item.dc:creator: @Akriam Akriam
item.description:
@Akriam wrote:

I used to swim. I was ‘scared’ of water when I was small and then tried to swim and I excelled at it. I am no where near where you guys are though

Read full topic

item.title: Pet Peeves
item.dc:creator: @j4m3s j4m3s
item.description:
@j4m3s wrote:

yeh… your 12 though… im 14.

Read full topic

item.title: Pet Peeves
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Umm when I tried for zone I got a 32 - 35 can’t quite remember, and I was feeling sick that day. I forgot my times. Then when I raced in Zone, I won so I think I got like a 31. I quit swimming training too cause it was getting boring, but I just do it in my pool. Well dad makes me, if I don’t he drumms me about “If you wanna ride like the king (Ricky Carmichael, my hero) You gotta train, train, train, train, ride, train,train” lol

Read full topic

item.title: Pet Peeves
item.dc:creator: @j4m3s j4m3s
item.description:
@j4m3s wrote:

bah, i used to swim. I just found training so FUCKING BORING AND GAY. But yeh… BTW what would you do for a 50 metre sprint… i do like a 31.

Read full topic

item.title: Pet Peeves
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“j4m3s, post:7, topic:31207”]slipping over and banging my wrist on my pool… an hour before i play water polo…

this just happened now.[/quote]
You play waterpolo? That’s one of the best sports ever. It’s so fun I always play it with my friends, lucky I’m a good swimmer x2 Senior Boy Champion/x1 Junior Boy Champion at my school

Read full topic

item.title: Pet Peeves
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“ilyaostr9, post:4, topic:31207”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=45512.msg555028#msg555028 date=1165037751]
I always tend to swing on my chair, and this kid who I hate and he hates me, I got in a fight with him and I won, but it got broken up. So I tend to swing on my chair (I am right now lol) And he always walks past me and grabs the back of my chair and pretends to flip me down. I throw rubbers at him in class, he’s fat so it gets hard to miss
[/quote]
Yeh, swinging for the love.[/quote]
Yeah, I’m still swinging

Read full topic

item.title: Pet Peeves
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

when im cracking a joke, its going well but i dont know when to stop so the joke fucks up

another thing is when i add an extra semicolon ; while writing code so for loops and if statements mess up, all cause a little semicolon which doesnt even have attention drawn to, loads of times iv ended up deleting bits of coding and writing it all out again

Read full topic

item.title: Pet Peeves
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

Yz85Racer:

I always tend to swing on my chair, and this kid who I hate and he hates me, I got in a fight with him and I won, but it got broken up. So I tend to swing on my chair (I am right now lol) And he always walks past me and grabs the back of my chair and pretends to flip me down. I throw rubbers at him in class, he’s fat so it gets hard to miss

Yeh, swinging for the love.
